dr.evomodel.operators
Class ImportanceSubtreeSwap

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.operators.SimpleMCMCOperator
      dr.evomodel.operators.AbstractTreeOperator
          dr.evomodel.operators.ImportanceSubtreeSwap
All Implemented Interfaces:
MCMCOperator
public class ImportanceSubtreeSwap
extends AbstractTreeOperator

Author:
Sebastian Hoehna

This class implements a subtree swap operator. The first subtree is chosen randomly and the second one is chosen according to the importance of the new tree. The importance are calculated by the multiplied clade probabilities.
